citeinfo.title: Mineral Commodity Summaries 2024 - ABRASIVES (MANUFACTURED) Data Release

descript.abstract: This data release contains the U.S. salient statistics and world production data extracted from the ABRASIVES (MANUFACTURED) data sheet of the USGS Mineral Commodity Summaries 2024.
descript.purpose: Published on an annual basis, the USGS Mineral Commodity Summaries report is the earliest Government publication to furnish estimates covering nonfuel mineral industry data. Data sheets contain information on the domestic industry structure, Government programs, tariffs, and 5-year salient statistics for over 90 individual minerals and materials.
descript.supplinf: Where possible, data are those finalized for publication in the 2022 U.S. Geological Survey Minerals Yearbook Volume I - Metals and Minerals. For 2023, USGS National Minerals Information Center provided estimates based on available data from USGS surveys of the industry, other industry sources, and mineral commodity specialist research.

idinfo.accconst: None. Please see 'Distribution Info' for details.
idinfo.useconst: None. Users are advised to read the dataset's metadata thoroughly to understand appropriate use and data limitations.

citeinfo.title: USGS National Minerals Information Center ABRASIVES (MANUFACTURED) Web Page
citeinfo.othercit: Provides information and links to all available USGS National Minerals Information Center publications about ABRASIVES (MANUFACTURED) by publication type and year.

attracc.attraccr: Where possible, data for all years except 2023 have been finalized for publication in the U.S. Geological Survey Minerals Yearbook Volume I - Metals and Minerals; otherwise the data are noted as estimated.

dataqual.logic: Data were checked to ensure that they match those published in the Mineral Commodity Summaries 2024. Data were peer reviewed by Mineral Commodity Specialists and approved by supervisors in compliance with USGS fundamental science practices.
dataqual.complete: This data release contains tabular data found in the associated publication Mineral Commodity Summaries 2024 (MCS 2024); additional detailed information is available in the full text version of MCS 2024.

citeinfo.title: USGS Minerals Yearbook Volume I - Metals and Minerals

srcinfo.srccontr: Source of salient statistics for 2019 through 2022 and basis for estimates for 2023. The data in the Minerals Yearbook are based on USGS surveys sent to companies involved in the industry for each mineral commodity.
trade statistics for 2019 through 2022 and basis of trade statistics estimates for 2023

procstep.procdesc: Salient statistics for each mineral commodity were compiled from published 2022 U.S. Geological Survey Minerals Yearbook Volume I - Metals and Minerals chapters or from finalized tables of those to be published. Data for 2023 were estimated based on available 2023 data and industry trends. Estimates for world production were made for 2023 in collaboration with USGS National Minerals Information Center Global Minerals Analysis specialists using best available data.

enttyp.enttypd: Comma Separated Value (CSV) file containing data.

attr.attrdef: Publication containing the data.
Mineral commodity for which the data were compiled

edom.edomvd: A manufactured abrasive for industrial use; types include fused aluminum oxide, silicon carbide, or metallic abrasives

attr.attrdef: Year for which the data were compiled.

U.S. Production: Fused aluminum oxide, crude. Production data for aluminum oxide are combined production data from the United States and Canada to avoid disclosing company proprietary data. Rounded to the nearest 5,000 tons to avoid disclosing company proprietary data. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
U.S. Production: Silicon carbide. Rounded to the nearest 5,000 tons to avoid disclosing company proprietary data. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
U.S. Production: Metallic abrasives. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Shipments: Metallic abrasives. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Imports for consumption: Fused aluminum oxide. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Imports for consumption: Silicon carbide. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Imports for consumption: Metallic abrasives. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Exports: Fused aluminum oxide. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Exports: Silicon carbide. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Exports: Metallic abrasives. Data are estimated for the most recent year.

Consumption, apparent: Fused aluminum oxide. Defined as imports – exports because production includes data from Canada; actual consumption is higher than that shown. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Consumption, apparent: Silicon carbide. Defined as production + imports – exports. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Consumption, apparent: Metallic abrasives. Defined as shipments + imports – exports. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Price, average unit value of imports, dollars per ton: Fused aluminum oxide, regular. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Price, average unit value of imports, dollars per ton: Fused aluminum oxide, high-purity. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Price, average unit value of imports, dollars per ton: Silicon carbide, crude. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Price, average unit value of imports, dollars per ton: Metallic abrasives. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Net import reliance as a percentage of apparent consumption: Fused aluminum oxide. Net imports are defined as imports – exports. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Net import reliance as a percentage of apparent consumption: Silicon carbide. Net imports are defined as imports – exports. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Net import reliance as a percentage of apparent consumption: Metallic abrasives. Net imports are defined as imports – exports. Data are estimated for the most recent year.

enttyp.enttypd: Comma Separated Value (CSV) file containing data.

attr.attrdef: Publication containing the data.
Country in which the manufactured abrasive is produced.

codesetd.codesets: Geopolitical Entities, Names, and Codes (GENC) Standard

attr.attrdef: Type of ABRASIVES (MANUFACTURED) for which production capacity was estimated

edom.edomvd: Fused aluminum oxide manufactured for use in antislip additives, bonded abrasives (such as abrasive grains that are made to adhere to each other and then are pressed or molded into abrasive tools), buffing and polishing compounds, coated abrasives (such as abrasive grains glued to a backing of paper or cloth), dry or wet blasting media, and tumbling media. Fused aluminum oxide in a micropowder form was used for industrial and electronic applications that require fine surface finishing.

Abrasive-grade silicon carbide manufactured for uses such as antislip abrasives, blasting abrasives, bonded abrasives, coated abrasives, polishing and buffing compounds, tumbling media, and wiresawing abrasives.

attr.attrdef: Estimated production capacity in 2022.
Estimated production capacity in 2023.

overview.eaover: Two CSV files were produced from the data published in the Mineral Commodity Summaries 2024. One includes U.S. Salient Statistics for production, consumption, trade, and other data pertinent to ABRASIVES (MANUFACTURED) for the years 2019 to 2023. The other includes world ABRASIVES (MANUFACTURED) of producing countries in 2022 and (or) 2023.
overview.eadetcit: Companion data for ABRASIVES (MANUFACTURED) data sheet of Mineral Commodity Summaries 2024

cntaddr.address: Denver Federal Center, Building 810, Mail Stop 302

distinfo.distliab: Unless otherwise stated, all data, metadata and related materials are considered to satisfy the quality standards relative to the purpose for which the data were collected. Although these data and associated metadata have been reviewed for accuracy and completeness and approved for release by the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), no warranty expressed or implied is made regarding the display or utility of the data on any other system or for general or scientific purposes, nor shall the act of distribution constitute any such warranty.
